content: Ratio between total tez collateral and outstanding ctez
A Tezos node pooling tez delegated to them to sign and publish blocks on the Tezos blockchain
A Tezos address that is granted access to deposit tez
The amount of tez that has been deposited in an oven to collateralize the ctez position
The amount of tez required in an oven for the oven to be fully collateralized
Ability to withdraw tez from your oven, either directly or by redeeming your ctez
% of collateral currently used to back outstanding ctez
Maximum amount of ctez that can be minted from the oven
Smart contract that governing the oven
Amount of ctez minted from the oven
% of price slippage tolerated for your swap
Max time before transaction is cancelled if not validated
Remaining amount of ctez that can be minted from this Oven. (Max mintable ctez - Outstanding ctez in the oven)
